scripts.build:watch:css: rm -rf static-dev/css && tailwind build -i tailwind/tailwind.css -o static-dev/css/style.min.css --watch --minify
scripts.build:production:react: vite build --config viteConfig/react.config.js && cd ../web/static-dev/js && rm -rf index.html && mv assets/*.js ./ && mv assets/*.css ../css/index.min.css && rm -rf assets && mv index.*.js index.min.js
scripts.build:production:js: vite build --config viteConfig/js.config.js && cd ../web/static-dev/js/ && rm -rf index.html && mv assets/*.js script.min.js && rm -rf assets
